hero.title: Sodix
hero.subtitle: Professional solutions in the field of zero-cycle construction

about.title: About Us
about.text: Sodix is a construction company with a wide range of services and an impressive portfolio of large-scale projects. The company was founded by experienced professionals and has its own fleet of specialized equipment, which has allowed it to implement a number of major projects throughout the Russian Federation.

sheet_piling.title: Sheet Piling
sheet_piling.description: Installation of sheet pile fences of any complexity.

slurry_wall.title: Slurry Wall
slurry_wall.description: Construction of "slurry walls" for foundations and enclosures.

bored_piles.title: Bored Piles
bored_piles.description: Installation of bored piles for deep foundations.

metal_structures.title: Metal Structures
metal_structures.description: Installation and dismantling of metal structures of any complexity.

jet_piles.title: Jet Piles
jet_piles.description: Installation of jet piles for soil stabilization.

anchor_systems.title: Anchor Systems
anchor_systems.description: Creation of anchor systems for retaining structures.
